item.title: MyChart Windows Phone
item.description: Built a Windows Phone 8 App that allows patients to access their health information, view test results,send messages to their doctor, etc.

item.title: Software Developer Intern
item.description: Designed and developed MyChart for Windows Phone 8 with two other interns.
